about_the_game:
The game software "Elementalt Guardian" is an original Japanese-style fantasy action card game. Players collect and nurture their companions to face challenges from around the world!

【Many characters】
It provides more than 40 different characters. Players can challenge powerful enemies from all over the world through character development. Of course, as the character level grows, some new abilities will be unlocked!

【Rich plot】
There are always many different stories happening on the fantasy continent. Please lead the team to start an exciting adventure!

【Abundant growth】
We provide a wealth of content for character growth: levels, grades, weapons, skills and rich element development... More powerful characters can help you experience every moment of the game!

【Gorgeous Vision】
In order to strengthen the characters' skills, we have produced a large number of models to show you cool skill performances!

name: 新月大陆

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: On the Continent, girls gather at the Magic Academy where they learn magic and combat skills,and embark on various adventures. An ancient prophecy circulates within the academy: when the new moon rises again, the world will face an unprecedented crisis, and only the academy girls can save it.
